sqlMap.select: SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, /* khyoon 2011.11.10 */ DECODE(b.FILE_EXTSN,'xls','xls','xlsx','xlsx','pdf','pdf','hwp','hwp','doc','doc','docx','docx','ppt','ppt','pptx','pptx','file') AS ICON_EXTSN, /*~khyoon */ b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_SIZE, a.CREAT_DT, ROUND((b.FILE_SIZE/1024),0) AS FILE_SIZE_KB, b.FILE_DOWNCNT FROM COMTNFILE a, COMTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY b.FILE_SN
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNFILE (ATCH_FILE_ID, CREAT_DT, USE_AT) VALUES ( #atchFileId#, SYSDATE, 'Y')

INSERT INTO COMTNFILEDETAIL ( ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_SIZE, FILE_CN ) VALUES ( #atchFileId#, #fileSn#, #fileStreCours#, #streFileNm#, #orignlFileNm#, #fileExtsn#, #fileMg#, #fileCn# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# AND FILE_SN = #fileSn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(FILE_SN),0)+1 AS FILE_SN FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#

SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_CN, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_SIZE, /* khyoon 2011.10.31 */ ROUND((FILE_SIZE/1024),0) AS FILE_SIZE_KB, FILE_DOWNCNT /*~khyoon */ FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#
FILE_SN = #fileSn#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNFILE SET USE_AT = 'N' WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(FILE_DOWNCNT),0)+1 AS ADD_FILE_DOWNCNT FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# AND FILE_SN = #fileSn#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNFILEDETAIL SET FILE_DOWNCNT = #fileDownCnt# WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# AND FILE_SN = #fileSn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DECODE(b.FILE_EXTSN,'xls','xls','xlsx','xlsx','pdf','pdf','hwp','hwp','doc','doc','docx','docx','ppt','ppt','pptx','pptx','file') AS ICON_EXTSN FROM ( SELECT MIN(FILE_SN) AS MIN_FILE_SN FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# ) a, COMTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE b.ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# AND b.FILE_SN = a.MIN_FILE_SN

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_SIZE, a.CREAT_DT FROM COMTNFILE a, COMTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
b.STRE_FILE_NM LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'
b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'
ORDER BY a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_SN ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(a.ATCH_FILE_ID) FROM COMTNFILE a, COMTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
b.STRE_FILE_NM LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'
b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'

SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_SIZE, a.CREAT_DT FROM COMTNFILE a, COMTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND UPPER(b.FILE_EXTSN) IN ('GIF','JPG','BMP','PNG') AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY b.FILE_SN
